venue.address_2: Driving directions come with your reservation
venue.name: Crabappel White Water Rafting

item.description:
When
Saturday, June 21, 2008 at 9:00 AM 20080621T130000Z

Where
Crabappel White Water Rafting
Rt 2 Driving directions come with your reservation
Shelburne Falls , MA 01370

Call Crabapple at 800 553 7238 and mention you are with the REIGINS party with your reservation if you want to be in the same boat...dont if you dont..LOL

Who should come
Those that want to stay Forever Young by doing excersize and doing exciting things..

Why
What else are you doing ? Getting fat and lazy??? or sittting home wishing you had some excitement and things to talk about after and for years to come...LOL

How to find the organizer(s)
"I will be inside the facility, the staff there will direct you to my area when you check in if i havent met you yet.."
--AL-r

Hi Everyone..
Ok this is the second event for Crabapple this year... some of you have been on this section last year, i think 12 or so...i forgot...

Things have been set up........................Call Crabapple at 800 553 7238 and mention you are with the REIGINS party with your reservation if you want to be in the same boat...dont if you dont..LOL
I am already Paid UP....ready for action again...


Im not sure i list another one this year..but..maybe... it might be the WEST river which was perfect last year..

The High Adventure Package (Dead River and the Kennebec in Maine ) 3 day weekend in sept or oct may be listed..not sure yet..

Maybe the West River in Vermont ???

We can talk about that last event at the June get together..


Anyway.... Here is the current one:

60 openings left as of APR 24 2008

Deerfield River - Upper section .......................................Marilin Monroe Bridge Section


The Monroe Bridge trip is full of waves and fun action!

The fun starts right below the Monroe Bridge dam with warm-up waves and then leads to "D Odds" and "L slide." areas.

Along the way our expert guides take time to play and work the river in a "surfing hole" or two.

Each rapid gets more exciting as the trip builds toward the final rapids of the day, "D T" and "The Mr. T."
These are pretty easy and get you ready for the nice lunch.


Trip Overview:


Trip time: Full day
Minimum Age: 15
Food: Cookout at base after trip
No. of people per boat: 6 - 8

Digital Slide Presentation



Prices and Schedule:
Rafting Price:

$105pp Saturday

Schedule: Please go to Monroe Bridge Schedule
Includes:

Pre-trip safety instruction, professional guide, PFD and helmet, transportation to

and from river, cookout at base (steak, chicken, fish or vegetarian option),

photo presentation of your adventure.

You might want to rent a wet suit bottom..but its not that cold anymore at this time of year for a full wetsuit.

www.crabapplewhitewater.com

see you later..al-r

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK
